import React,{ Component } from "react"; import axios from 'axios'; export default class Product extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { product_data : [] } } static defaultProps = { apiUrl : 'http://localhost/my-app1/' }; componentDidMount = async() =>{ const data = new FormData(); data.append('get_posts', true); data.append('post_type', 10); const config = { method: 'post', url: this.props.apiUrl, headers: {}, data : data }; const prdct = await axios(config); const makePrdct = []; for(let key in prdct.data.data){ let row = prdct.data.data[key]; makePrdct.push({ id : row.id, title : row.title, featured : row.featured, link : row.link, content : row.content, excerpt : row.excer }) } } render(){ return(

Product
